name: Disable Ozh's Admin Dropdown Menu
author: Zaantar

sections.description:
Disables Ozh’s Admin Dropdown Menu for selected users. (Zaantar does not like it; nothing personal, though!)

I can’t guarantee any support in the future nor further development, but it is to be expected. Kindly inform me about bugs, if you find any, or propose new features: zaantar@zaantar.eu.
sections.installation:
• Install as usual.
  • Access settings via Options –> Disable Ozh’s Admin Dropdown Menu
  • Set up IDs of users who shall have standard WordPress admin area layout.
sections.changelog:
1.2

  • fixed bug in multisite

1.1

  • i18zed
  • uploaded to wordpress.org
  • czech translation

1.O

  • first version
